name: Friends
description:
When I was making this necklace a phrase kept coming to mind - you are only as rich as your relationships. The people in our lives are really important especially our friends. You can't choose your family but you can choose your friends, right? This necklace is a reminder of those amazing people who cheer for us, comfort us and love us. 

This pendant is pretty unique. I used a rubber stamp to make this impression on PMC (precious metal clay) and then fired the clay - the organic material burns away and all that is left is the fine silver.

PMC isn't my usual medium and I only plan on making one of these pendants so I can guarantee you that this is totally unique and one-of-a-kind.

- 45cm sterling silver ball chain
- 20mm fine silver handmade pendant

name: Secrets
description:
I'm not going to lie, I can't tell you what this necklace says or what language it is written in hence the name Secrets. You can try to decipher it's message but to me it remains a mystery.

This pendant is pretty unique. I used a rubber stamp to make this impression on PMC (precious metal clay) and then fired the clay - the organic material burns away and all that is left is the fine silver.

PMC isn't my usual medium and I only plan on making one of these pendants so I can guarantee you that this is totally unique and one-of-a-kind.

- 45cm sterling silver ball chain
- 20mm fine silver handmade pendant

name: Cherish
description:
I made this necklace to be a little reminder of all those precious moments in our day that we so easily forget. The laughter, the smiles, the new things that we learn, the daydreams and playing with our kids. All the things that we cherish.

This pendant is pretty unique. I used a rubber stamp to make this impression on PMC (precious metal clay) and then fired the clay - the organic material burns away and all that is left is the fine silver.

PMC isn't my usual medium and I only plan on making one of these pendants so I can guarantee you that this is totally unique and one-of-a-kind.

- 45cm sterling silver ball chain
- 20mm fine silver handmade pendant

name: Little Lotus
description:
This piece is small and sweet. A tiny little disc is accompanied by a little freshwater pearl in perfect peach and some salmon coloured coral. It is perfect for adding a little something to an everyday outfit. I love the combination of colours in this piece, the shiny sterling silver and the delicate shades of pink. Lovely.

- 45cm sterling silver belcher chain
- 10mm disc stamped with lotus design
- freshwater pearl
- coral

name: Wishing on a Star
description: Have you ever wished on a shooting star? I have. And i created this sparkling necklace in memory of all those wishes. You could make a wish on this shooting star and wear it until your wish comes true! When you wish upon a star... - 16mm hand stamped disc - silver plated shooting star charm - white chinese crystal bead - 40cm sterling silver belcher chain
